ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Xegony Guilds
ygData.msgSnippet: That s hilarious!  The funny thing - there are so few of us higher level Bards (even on a heavily populated server) on Xegony - seems like it s mostly 1 per
ygData.messageBody:
That's hilarious! The funny thing - there are so few of us higher level
Bards (even on a heavily populated server) on Xegony - seems like it's
mostly 1 per Guild...

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Robert(Bob) Smith [mailto:rws1111@...]
Sent: Friday, May 11, 2001 7:40 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Xegony Guilds


Last night I had a revelation -- I know the guilds of Xegony by thier
Bards. For example, last night in Hate, I was grouped with
a "Darkfox" and a "Slyde"... when ask about AD, my only comment
was, "they have a SUPER nice bard by the name of Tawney."

Maybe I gotta get out more. *Grins*

Be well,

Gaelthorne
Xegony
